title: Demi Vollering Storms to Stage win and Overall Victory in Itzulia Women
content:
Dutchwoman defends title in style, overpowering race leader Mischa Bredewold and her other rivals with a flurry of uphill attacks.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering Storms to Stage win and Overall Victory in Itzulia Women on Velo.
author: sstokes
